
Two rushed admins reused a prime for their RSA keys. Intercept the encrypted message: ciphertext1: 2593804671329352966118910113110264518902559816697408052117810394709576712303812695702369452714971145102588092032787475566340972138172506151492138082538583, ciphertext2: 4316380917163915338354993175977331597787929213470732129542546838603045827692297908911738342347609297572600267352178416129183615863666278097383635377212834 and find the shared secret.


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5387389459782307429324530757709785117506935954841884598813095417497184111811211467508870621010310647216069288069403931250723233881642713468772036619732687, n2=6735112382861735333105477355252828114550134824979585666794837386237972684355348166228168018232852178687214596691521893095170206014098201618461365269216549, e=2340843569085013470810134757954397639394122022938499248734122893382797029892687414878461626321980857043649582060868523463447968914740220461681237817480369

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{ttnr62xu}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 2593804671329352966118910113110264518902559816697408052117810394709576712303812695702369452714971145102588092032787475566340972138172506151492138082538583, ciphertext2: 4316380917163915338354993175977331597787929213470732129542546838603045827692297908911738342347609297572600267352178416129183615863666278097383635377212834
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5387389459782307429324530757709785117506935954841884598813095417497184111811211467508870621010310647216069288069403931250723233881642713468772036619732687, n2=6735112382861735333105477355252828114550134824979585666794837386237972684355348166228168018232852178687214596691521893095170206014098201618461365269216549, e=2340843569085013470810134757954397639394122022938499248734122893382797029892687414878461626321980857043649582060868523463447968914740220461681237817480369
extra_info: p=87657888100336329415120190943030760354969490855852697791625288738557684956511, q=61459265977474956647336913826784573096915724848091973308796459864643807952017, r=109586606278867345900424275918137132115722551514501263943149853689254331027797, φ(n1)=5387389459782307429324530757709785117506935954841884598813095417497184111811062350354792809724248190111299472735952046035019289210542291720168835126824160, φ(n2)=6735112382861735333105477355252828114550134824979585666794837386237972684355177120355911675930304417497469674986309254818807612776846255304907467130236736

archetype: rsa
